Class FlightList

java.lang.Object
FlightList
public class FlightList
extends java.lang.Object
Advanced Software Engineering - Coursework Reads and processes a file input from the manager class. Creates an Arraylist to store the flights from the input files and populates it.
Author:
Lynsey Kirk, Kuda Mugara, Rachana Patel, Cameron Scott, Robert Stone

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    FlightList()
    creates an ArrayList to hold flight objects

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addFlight​(Flight f)
    This method adds the flight validated by the constructor to the flight list

    Creates a HashMap of flights

    This method finds the flight object by the given flight code
    java.util.ArrayList<Flight> getAllFlights()  
    int numberOfFlights()  
    void readFile​(java.lang.String filename)
    Reads specified files, extracts flight information, creating flight objects Add the information to flight list

  • Constructor Details

    • FlightList

      public FlightList()
      creates an ArrayList to hold flight objects

  • Method Details

    • addFlight

      public boolean addFlight​(Flight f)
      This method adds the flight validated by the constructor to the flight list
      Parameters:
      f - the flight to be added to the array list

    • findByCode

      public Flight findByCode​(java.lang.String flightcode)
      This method finds the flight object by the given flight code
      Parameters:
      flightcode - the flight to be found

    • getAllFlights

      public java.util.ArrayList<Flight> getAllFlights()
      Returns:
      all the flights in the list added using the flightList()

    • numberOfFlights

      public int numberOfFlights()
      Returns:
      all the flights in the list added using the flightList()

    • readFile

      public void readFile​(java.lang.String filename)
      Reads specified files, extracts flight information, creating flight objects Add the information to flight list
      Parameters:
      filename - is the name of the input file
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file does not exists
